news_header: A tram accident in central Oslo caused injuries and significant material damage.
news_text: A tram derailed in downtown Oslo, crashing into the Eplehuset store. The incident occurred around 11 a.m. with approximately 20 people present, including the driver. Four individuals sustained minor injuries, including the tram driver. Eyewitnesses described the scene as chaotic, with the tram blocking the street and extending into the store. Fortunately, no employees or customers were harmed, but the material damage is substantial. Authorities are assessing the damage, and the building has been evacuated for safety inspections. Public transport services have been delayed as a result of the accident.
